fields.description:
A bunch of files were  moved from one directory to another but their crc files did not get moved appropriately. Following this move, an application  tries to access these files but gets a crc error. Here is a snippet from the namenode logs:

unprotectedRenameTo: failed to rename /user/xxx/foo-fix/.254.crc to /user/xxx/foo/.254.crc because destination exists
unprotectedRenameTo: failed to rename /user/xxx/foo-fix/.255.crc to /user/xxx/foo/.255.crc because destination exists

fields.summary: spurious data corruption detected because bad crc file
